ModMetaData.name: TwitchToolkit - Lootboxes for 2.0e
ModMetaData.author: Captolamia
ModMetaData.description: 🎁 Daily Mystery Boxes for Twitch Viewers - Add exciting daily lootboxes to your RimWorld streams! Viewers receive a random lootbox each day containing anywhere from 1 to 10,000 coins. Streamers can customize the coin range to fit their economy. Perfect for rewarding loyal viewers and adding daily anticipation to your channel.
